column1: A Pandas Series is one-dimensional labeled array capable of holding data of any type (integer
column4: Python objects etc.). The axis labels are collectively called indexes.

column1: Pandas Series is created by loading the datasets from existing storage which can be a SQL database
column2: a CSV file or an Excel file. It can be created from lists

Pandas DataFrame is a two-dimensional data structure with labeled axes (rows and columns). It is created by loading the datasets from existing storage which can be a SQL database
column2: a CSV file or an Excel file. It can be created from lists
